name: sms-verification-api
description: SMS Phone Verification API using AWS SNS HTTP API with Hono server on Cloudflare Workers

scripts.ship: bun run standard-version --release-as patch; bun publish
scripts.deploy:docs: cd docs && bun run build && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:docs:staging: cd docs && bun run build && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:docs:production: cd docs && bun run build && wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.deploy:all: bun run deploy && bun run deploy:docs
scripts.deploy:all:staging: bun run deploy:staging && bun run deploy:docs:staging
scripts.deploy:all:production: bun run deploy:production && bun run deploy:docs:production
scripts.build: echo 'No build step needed for Workers'

author: vtempest
